dict.string: Touch the image used to create the graphic, and choose a different image. Try the frog, or an alien, or even a friendly monster ðŸ‘¾.

### Youâ€™re a ðŸŒŸ?
Instead of touching and dragging, try touching the scene just once in different places. Notice that a new graphic is added each time you touch the scene. Thatâ€™s because a single touch causes just one touch event, and `addImage(touch:)` is called only once.
